DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this investigation is to demonstrate non-inferiority in outcome of Custodiol-N against Custodiol in heart transplantation.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Organ Perfusion With Custodiol-N Solution Compared With Custodiol Solution in Heart Transplantation
